title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: TheStatistical Account of Scotland records his having been bornat a farm called Skipmyre, in the parish of Tinwald, Dumfries-shire, about the year 1660, and his having representedDumfries, arc, more than once in the Scottish Parliament(Vol. i., p. 165.) He projected the Bank of Scotland, as established in 1695.
